00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00027 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_adaptor.h>
00028 #include <thrust/iterator/counting_iterator.h>
00029 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_categories.h>
00030 
00031 namespace thrust
00032 {
00033 
00034 namespace experimental
00035 {
00036 
00037 template<typename Value>
00038   class constant_iterator
00039     : public iterator_adaptor<constant_iterator<Value>,
00040                               counting_iterator<ptrdiff_t, ptrdiff_t>,
00041                               Value,
00042                               thrust::experimental::random_access_universal_iterator_tag,
00043                               Value const &,
00044                               Value *,
00045                               ptrdiff_t>
00046 {
00047     friend class iterator_core_access;
00048 
00049     //typedef counting_iterator<ptrdiff_t,ptrdiff_t> Base;
00050 
00051     typedef iterator_adaptor<constant_iterator<Value>,
00052                              counting_iterator<ptrdiff_t, ptrdiff_t>,
00053                              Value,
00054                              thrust::experimental::random_access_universal_iterator_tag,
00055                              Value const &,
00056                              Value *,
00057                              ptrdiff_t> super_t;
00058 
00059   public:
00060     typedef Value const & reference;
00061     typedef typename super_t::difference_type difference_type;
00062 
00063     __host__ __device__
00064     constant_iterator(void){};
00065 
00066   //  // XXX nvcc can't compile this at the moment
00067   //  //__host__ __device__
00068   //  //constant_iterator(constant_iterator const &rhs):super_t(rhs.base()){}
00069 
00070     __host__ __device__
00071     constant_iterator(Value const& v, ptrdiff_t const& c = ptrdiff_t())
00072       : super_t(typename super_t::base_type(c)), m_value(v) {}
00073 
00074     __host__ __device__
00075     Value const& value(void) const
00076     { return m_value; }
00077 
00078   protected:
00079     __host__ __device__
00080     Value const& value_reference(void) const
00081     { return m_value; }
00082 
00083     __host__ __device__
00084     Value & value_reference(void)
00085     { return m_value; }
00086   
00087   private: // Core iterator interface
00088     __host__ __device__
00089     typename constant_iterator::reference dereference(void) const
00090     {
00091       return m_value;
00092     }
00093 
00094   private:
00095     Value m_value;
00096 }; // end constant_iterator
00097 
00098 template<typename T>
00099 __host__ __device__
00100 constant_iterator<T> make_constant_iterator(T x, ptrdiff_t c = ptrdiff_t())
00101 {
00102   return constant_iterator<T>(x, c);
00103 } // end make_constant_iterator()

00115 namespace detail

00117 
00118 template<typename T>
00119   struct make_device_dereferenceable< thrust::experimental::constant_iterator<T> >
00120 {
00121   __host__ __device__
00122   static
00123   thrust::experimental::constant_iterator<T> &
00124   transform(thrust::experimental::constant_iterator<T> &x)
00125   {
00126     return x;
00127   } // end transform()
00128 
00129   __host__ __device__
00130   static
00131   const thrust::experimental::constant_iterator<T> &
00132   transform(const thrust::experimental::constant_iterator<T> &x)
00133   {
00134     return x;
00135   } // end transform()
00136 }; // end make_device_dereferenceable
